| Record compliance | Select a key Records input and verify compliance.  Correct revision in use? All fields on the record completed?  If records are changed after initial recording/entry, are changes clearly legible (errors marked through and initialed); recorded in ink, not pencil? Free of “correction fluid”? |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
